links.title: Unusual Volume Losers Today - Down On High Relative Volume (RVol) | NYSE, NASDAQ and AMEX
links.description: Unusual volume losers are stocks that are moving lower on unusually high volume. Increased volume flows are correlated with volatility. A heightened volume indicates something is going on today and that the stock is "in play". A stock moving down on unusually high volume typically implies distribution of the stock.

links.description: Comerica Incorporated (NYSE: CMA) is a financial services company headquartered in Dallas, Texas, and strategically aligned by three business segments: The Commercial Bank, The Retail Bank, and Wealth Management. Comerica focuses on relationships, and helping people and businesses be successful.
